message.body: I thought the pics were great and we chose the best ones. Oh well.
How can we dissuade Lois from reselecting photos? I think its a royally bad idea for her to do that
I don't know. When she gets her mind made up it's hard, but I think it's OC. She should have selected them herself.

I think it's kind of disrespectful all around. Michael and I went carefully through all photos. Now she's saying we are incompetent and she's going to ask him to work more touching up other photos? I don't know. I'm kind of feeling done.
Me Emma? No way. She can deal with it as she should have from the beginning if she wanted to choose herself. I invited her to come but she didn't.
Oops, my last text was for lois
Ok. And I agree with you.
